word:
The invitation to old and young is, "Come unto Me, all ye that labor and are heavy laden, and I will give 
                                                                           112
you rest.  Take My yoke upon you, and learn of Me; for I am meek and lowly in heart; and ye shall find rest unto your souls" [Matthew 11:28-30].  Thank the Lord, with heart and soul and voice, that there is a haven of rest, sweet rest.  It is your privilege, and it is my privilege, to accept the invitation, and rest.  We want now that our remnant of life should be as free as possible from every perplexity and care, that we shall have repose in the life of Christ.  "My yoke," He says, "is easy, and My burden is light."
